title: Foundational Programming Course Utilizing 3D Multi-User Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate in a 3D virtual environment using personal devices to apply programming concepts. Project-based assessments holistically measure problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: Learners can solve puzzle-based tasks with 80% accuracy by utilizing basic programming structures (conditional statements, loops, variables) in a 3D virtual environment.
Learners collaboratively create in-game interactive artwork with peers and apply collaborative problem-solving strategies at least three times.
Learners document the process of analyzing and correcting code errors using in-game debugging tools with 100% participation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
